name: antigravity-quota-tray
description: Windows system tray app to monitor Google Antigravity AI model quota usage

scripts.package: pkg dist/main.js -t node18-win-x64 -o antigravity-quota.exe --assets assets/**/* --assets node_modules/systray2/traybin/**/* && node scripts/postpackage.js
scripts.package-mac: pkg dist/main.js -t node18-macos-x64,node18-macos-arm64 -o antigravity-quota-mac --assets assets/**/* --assets node_modules/systray2/traybin/**/* && node scripts/postpackage-mac.js
